org.ow2.chameleon.core.activators

Class CoreActivator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ow2.chameleon.core.activators.CoreActivator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator

    public class CoreActivator
extends Object
implements org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator
    Core activator. A bit different from the DirectoryBundleMonitor as it handles the interactive case.
    Version:
    $Id: 1.0.4 $Id
    Author:
    The OW2 Chameleon Team
